<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1710) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Premonition of Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1707)

</column>

---

You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies. When you use [Premonition of Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1707), allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.
name: Shared Clarity
